maze.gui.mazeeditor
Class ConjoinedMazeTemplate

java.lang.Object
  maze.gui.mazeeditor.MazeTemplate
      maze.gui.mazeeditor.ConjoinedMazeTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoxTemplate, CornerTemplate, CrossTemplate, StaggeredTemplate, StraightTemplate, WaveTemplate, ZigZagTemplate
public abstract class ConjoinedMazeTemplate
extends MazeTemplate

This class provides a parent class to any maze template that is one piece. This means that a peg can be reached by any other peg just by traversing the walls and pegs in the template.

Author:
Johnathan Smith

getCenterPoints

public java.awt.Point[] getCenterPoints(CellSize size)
Returns an array consisting of one element, the center peg position. This position represents where the center peg should be positioned on the screen.

Specified by:
getCenterPoints in class MazeTemplate
Parameters:
size - the dimensions of the maze being displayed
Returns:
